Kazu Haga a trainer, educator, student and practitioner of nonviolence and restorative justice. He is a core member of Building Belonging.
Kazu Haga is a trainer and practitioner of nonviolence and restorative justice, a core member of the Ahimsa Collective and the Fierce Vulnerability Network.
